Preprint available for accepted paper

May 29, 2023

Our paper titled Efficient Adaptive Stochastic Collocation Strategies for Advection-Diffusion Problems with Uncertain Inputs is availible as a preprint. This is to appear in the Springer Journal of Scientific Computing.
